code_examples.code:

```
# pytest.ini

addopts = --pwd-platform=all

# tests/test_pwd.py
from pytest import mark, fixture
import pwd

@fixture(autouse=True)
def platform():
    yield pwd.getpwuid(1) # Replace 1 with your user ID if needed

@mark.parametrize("platform", [pwd.Platform.DARWIN, pwd.Platform.POSIX])
def test_getpwuid(platform):
    assert platform == pwd.getplatform()
```
